message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-value item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $9,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I can do $8,200, which is still a great deal considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $8,100, which is a compromise I'm willing to make. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,600 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I can meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm willing to do $7,900 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $8,000, which is the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to make one final offer of $8,050, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,800 for the product. This is my final offer.
